com.diffplug.common.swt.dnd

Class StructuredDrop

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.diffplug.common.swt.dnd.StructuredDrop

  • public class StructuredDrop
extends Object
    Typed mechanism for implementing drop listeners. https://eclipse.org/articles/Article-SWT-DND/DND-in-SWT.html
